## Refried Beans

<span class="mh">Servings:</span> 3-6 servings, makes approximately 3 cups of beans
<br>

<span class="mh">Ingredients:</span>  
<div class="my2cols">
<ul>
  <li>1 cup dried pinto beans</li>
  <li>&frac12; tsp salt</li>
  <br><br>
</ul>
</div>
<br>
<span class="mh">Directions:</span> 
<div class="my2cols">
<ol>
  <li>Soak beans in water; hot water in the am and soak through out the day</li>
  <li>Put beans into Instant Pot with 1&frac23; cup water</li>
  <li>Cook on high for 16-20 minutes, natural release of pressure (~10-20 minutes)</li>
  <li>Put contents (beans and liquid) into blender at low speed for 45-60 seconds</li>
</ol>
</div>


<span class="mh">NOTES:</span> Can make without soaking beans by putting directly into instant pot for 60 minutes and ~2.5-3 cups of water
